text: Bride of Chucky is a 1998 American fantasy horror comedy movie directed by Ronny Yu. It is the fourth movie in the Child's Play series. It stars Jennifer Tilly as Tiffany and Brad Dourif as Chucky. Costars include Katherine Heigl and John Ritter. It is set in New Jersey. Bride of Chucky made more than $50 million worldwide at the box office, thereby becoming the most successful part of the series. The movie reviews were mixed. ==References== ==Other websites== * * * * Category:1998 comedy movies Category:1998 horror movies Category:Child's Play movies Category:American black comedy movies Category:American horror movies Category:American sequel movies Category:American supernatural movies Category:Supernatural horror movies Category:Comedy horror movies Category:1990s English-language movies Category:Movies set in New Jersey Category:BDSM in movies Category:1990s sequel movies Category:Universal Pictures movies Category:1990s black comedy movies Category:Movies set in hotels Category:American road movies Category:Slasher movies Category:1990s road movies Category:Movies featuring puppetry Category:Movies about witchcraft Category:1990s supernatural movies
title: Bride of Chucky
